addToken(address).details: Adds a new token to the staking contract

balanceOf(address,address).details: Computes the amount of tokens that the `account` has staked

returns._0: the amount of `token` tokens that the `account` has staked
The address controlling timelocked functions (e.g. KYC requirement changes)

getTokens().details: Returns the list of tokens that can be staked

returns._tokens: the list of tokens that can be staked

returns._0: whether the specified token requires msg.sender to be KYCed before staking
true if the counterparty is compliant according to the current verification registry, taking into account the KYC requirement.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.kycRequired: whether the specified token requires msg.sender to be KYCed before staking

stake(address,uint256).details: Stakes tokens for the caller into the staking contract

stake(address,uint256,address).details: funds are subtracted from msg.sender, stake is credited to recipient

totalStaked(address).details: Computes the total amount of tokens that have been staked

returns._0: the total amount of `token` tokens that have been staked

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Withdraws tokens for the caller from the staking contract

withdrawStakeAndClaimRewards(address,uin.details: Withdraws tokens for the caller from the staking contractClaims all rewards of the incentivized `token` for the caller

rewardsController.details: Main contract used for interacting with rewards mechanism.

timelockController.details: Address controlling timelocked functions (e.g. KYC requirement changes)

userStake.details: Mapping with the staked amount of each account for each token.token => user => amount

stake(address,uint256,address).notice: msg.sender stakes tokens for the recipient into the staking contract
